content.text: GUESS WHAT BITCHES, IM NOT FUCKING DEAD (yet) AND IM LEARNING TO CODE!! you may be wondering 'IQ IQ dont you AALREADY know HOW to code i mean you coded the website RIGHT???' well yes but actually NO this took me SO fucking long to understand how to do its UNREAL. BUT ANYWAYS THATS BESIDES THE POINT, im learning because i wanna code a game for the playdate! im hoping with a little effort luck and help from the oh so wonderful community it wont be so bad on the creating aspect! as for what kind of game im thinking a fan game of space station 13 where you work as either a bartender or a chemist filling out orders for other crew!, welp untill next time!
